text: The first round pick of the NFL draft, Kyler Murray was selected by the Arizona Cardinals. He played in Oklahoma. He won the Heisman Trophy in 2018, which is an award for the most outstanding college football player in the United States. Category:1997 births Category:African-American players of American football Category:Arizona Cardinals players Category:Heisman Trophy winners Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:Living people
title: Kyler Murray
